WorkItem.Description:
I tried to include an additional script in the html pane
<script src="jquery.ezpz_tooltip.js"></script>
Â 
However, my reference in the JQuery pane was not recognised:
 $("#MyLink").ezpz_tooltip({

Comments.Message: Have you tried specifying the resource with a fully qualified path? The html pages will be running in the context of a Web Development Server hosted in the AppData path of jQueryBuddy and will be looking for it locally on disk in the Virtual Directory it's set up. You could either specify a full path name (might need prefix file:/// ?) or you could also use a CDN server if the file is hosted there - both Google and Microsoft offer those.
